item.title: [317] Making NPC'S Shout
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

under

if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == true) {

put

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2500) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "general graardor!"; } }]

item.title: [317] Making NPC'S Shout
item.dc:creator: @Stijn12 Stijn12
item.description:
@Stijn12 wrote:

The problem is it gives errors when i compile.
The code did work on my other 317 delta source.
this is the code:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2500) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "General Graardor!"; } }

What to do?
Yes i did put it in NPCHANDLER.
Still didnâ€™t work.
